msItem.title: Sharaf-namah-i Shahi
msItem.note: Ff. 28-end is in more than one hand and may contain sections of different compositions. Part is concerned with the rulers of Astrakhan. Apparently, not so much 'A Short History of the Sultans of Mawara al-Nahr' as a fragment of the Sharaf-namah. This is stated in a note inserted in the MS. It begins with an account of Changiz Khan's wives and sons.
msItem.incipit: Incipit, after rubric: Pushidah namanad ki Khan-i Rustam-nishai Changiz Khan

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org

list.item: History of Central Asia, Mongols, Uzbeks.
